title: Attendance under 85%
content:
Our class mentor today went on a spree of explaining that if we have our attendance below 85% we will have to get an affidavit and have to get a ton of signatures....is this true or just some random scares?

Also will a genuine medical certificate be enough?

comments.body: A medical certificate should be enough I'm not sure though
Which sem are you in?
The affidavit thing is bs right?
1st
Should be like why would they do that there are plenty of people in my section who probably have attendance lesser than 85. There was a post on attendance previously you should check it out
Is it 80 or 85? If it is 85 im fucked

They always say that, but in reality they only make a deal out of it if it's like below 75.

Then you neet to meet with someone and give an apology letter or something
They say 85 but from what I have heard they let it slide if you're a bit short

The minimum attendance required was 80% when I was in the first sem, anything lower than that and you'd either have to submit a medical certificate to make up for it or sign a document and get chewed out by the chairperson. Unless your attendance is below 75 I wouldn't be worried. The affidavit thing is complete bs.
I have a valid medical certificate...and my minimum is 75% in maths and we have 15 more sessions...so hopefully I will be fine
Join college clubs, you can easily scam attendance

S&H department is pretty chill I'm assuming your in that maximum they ask you to sign a form saying you wouldn't be repeating the same. Or a call with your parents if you don't have medical certificate 
My friend wrote his second semester ESA with 58% in physics in July only
Ahh shit, I'm above 80 in all, but idts I will be able to be above 85, I'm scared
I am in one club rn.....but ny mentor said that they won't be giving attendance to 1st years for club activities
You'll do just fine.
They do always say that but I never had a problem üòÖ

I'm in second year rn and the minimum attendance is 70% lol
They've sent a message saying those who've gotten below this must sign an affidavit XD.

PESU senior here. I used to have 60-70% attendance. But whenever I went to class I used to listen to class with complete attention and respond to the questions asked and also used to score pretty well in ISAs. Then at the end of sem I just approached the faculty and informed her regarding attendance shortage and she was like you don't worry I will take care. Guess I was lucky ü§åüèª
They will say 85% is minimum but at last they will consider for 80% if teachers are good if u have 75% they will give the 5% attendance and let u to write the exam
Which section are you in?

Guys look, yes it is true that the real criteria is around 75% ish but don't fuck with your attendance. And yes, medical certificates guarantee you the attendance you missed out on. I have never had to submit an affidavit, not sure if there are any changes.
My friend got attendance for an entire week of leave (cultural club)
What do they get out of these "threats"?
That's literally the smallest amount of power they can wield on you and somehow they let it get to their heads also üòÇ
M
